name: Micro Manager Lite
description:
This is a game for Dev League Round 6 with the theme "Micro Manager", made in under 24 hours.

You become as a micro manager and get your employees to work until you get the work done! Here are some quick things you need to know!

Rest - Employees rest their stamina, but consumes performance and hunger as time progresses

Work - Consumes stamina, performance, and hunger. But it gets the job done.

Eat - Restores hunger

Chat - Restores performance
